# Plot

```{r}
to.plot <- stats %>% merge(sample_metadata, by="id_met") 
```

Boxplots with mean methylation rate per lineage
```{r}
p <- ggboxplot(to.plot, x="plate", y="rate", fill="#F8766D") +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.5, color="#F8766D", size=0.80) +
  # coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,75)) +
  labs(x="", y="Global methylation (%)") +
  theme(
    axis.text.y = element_text(size=rel(0.9))
  )
  # theme_bw() +
  # theme_pub()
print(p)


# pdf(paste0(io$outdir,"/globalmet_lineages.pdf"), width=9, height=5, useDingbats = F)
# print(p)
# dev.off()
```

Boxplots with coverage per lineage
```{r}
p <- ggboxplot(to.plot, x="plate", y="nCG", fill="#F8766D") +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.5, color="#F8766D", size=0.80) +
  # coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,10)) +
  scale_y_log10() +
  labs(x="", y="Number of CpGs") +
  theme(
    axis.text.y = element_text(size=rel(0.9))
  )
  # theme_bw() +
  # theme_pub()
print(p)


# pdf(paste0(io$outdir,"/globalmet_lineages.pdf"), width=9, height=5, useDingbats = F)
# print(p)
# dev.off()
```

Correlation between mean methylation rate and coverage
```{r}
# to.plot[,mean2:=log2(((mean/100)+0.01)/(1-(mean/100)+0.01))]

p <- ggscatter(to.plot, x="rate", y="nCG", color="tdTOM") +
  yscale("log10", .format = TRUE) +
  geom_smooth(method="lm") +
  theme_classic()
  # theme_pub()

print(p)
```
